title: Personalized Learning Environment (PLE) Design Through Collaborative Social Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Constructs a PLE (Personal Learning Environment) model integrating formal and informal collaborative learning in social domains for pre-professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to enhance practical competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can complete peer feedback-based assignments three or more times using collaboration tools within the LMS
Learners can record daily learning achievements in digital portfolios at over 80% consistency in a PLE environment
Learners can propose five or more collaborative ideas for solving social issues in online discussion forums
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
